amendment.description: See pages H8306-H8307 in the Congressional Record of August 2, 1995 for a complete record of House consideration of H.R. 1874.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Agriculture.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Agriculture amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
